review:
Dr Jana was there in OT as a child specialist during delivery of my wife - as planned & suggested by our gynaecologist Dr Sanhita Kanungo..
I got to interact with Dr Jana during my baby's first follow up visit at AMRI, Mukundapur. It was a thorough 30 mins of interaction, where he briefed us about each & every basics of parenting/child care.. listened to all our queries  patiently & clarified all doubts of my wife.. A highly experienced doctor who only speaks of all natural methods possible to handle a baby...That's the best part of him....I am very much satisfied & highly recommend Him...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I took my 8 days old daughter as I wanted to fix a good doctor for my daughter for all the ongoing vacinnation and upcoming checkups as I got very positive feedback about him. As par with my expectations, I found him an awesome doctor who explains everything so well and really happy to see such a nice human being in today's professional environment. Prescribes very less medicine and believes in natural nutrition and well being by maintaining a healthy life style. Salute his ideology.  Highly recommend him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We were visiting India from USA with our 7 month daughter.We had consulted Dr. Jana twice for viral fever and chicken pox. We were pleasantly surprised with his attitude.I think it is fair to say that his level of service surpasses his counterparts in USA. His style of treatment was totally inline with our views. He is a firm believer of giving very less medicine and let our body take care of ourselves.We can't recommend him enough.Great doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: He is  very nice and friendly.. I am very satisfied with his treatment..he explained basics things to me
********* ******* We visited him for our son who was suffering from Viral fever. His patient hearing and minimal medication did the trick for our kid.

*** ***** **** ** **** *** *** *** He save my 10 days old son from sepsis. which became life threats for my child. I transferred my child from Matri Bhavan Hospital to mukundapur AMRI and immediately he started his medication. His treatment was very unique and he is also a kind hearted person.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: Dr. Jana has been treating my son since birth. My son was born one and a half month earlier than the EDD since I was diagnosed with Polyhydramnios. It took utmost care and explained every single thing with immense patience. He hardly prescribes any medicine and strongly believes in healthy food and lifestyle habits. We are extremely satisfied and would highly recommend him. In today's out and out professional world it's very hard to find a true guide like him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My daughter was under his treatment from birth hour. Jana Sir is like a saviour of my daughter. Outmost care , minimal medication ,patience these are what he is made . In one word brilliant.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Nice doctor with excellent treatment. less medicine, he is the HOD in Vellore CMC and he really helped us.
